title: Lee sin mains "lee was gutted, rito why you destroy my champ" VS reality
body:
Lee sin is still an extremely OP jungler, sporting his 7th year as a top meta pick.

Recently he was "gutted" when they lowered his damage to a "reasonable" amount

Dragon's Rage (R):
Damage decreased to 150/300/450 from 200/400/600

However you have to remember the **200% AD scaling**, which still makes the ult a point and click nuke that also has a knockback and up, not to mention %current health dmg.

"but w8, look at his winrate/playrate"

ok.

http://champion.gg/champion/LeeSin/Jungle

So we can see he has at least a 52% win rate til 35 minutes, which is the time when most games have already ended.

Secondly the winrate by games played is extremely high 53% across the board.

And lastly, hes at pick 1 (as always, i dont think there has ever been a time when he wasnt the most popular pick since his release) 


Lee sin is still the annoying LCS champ we have always known. Sadly due to "community backlash" he will never actually get nerfed. {{champion:64}}



on the other hand, runescape on twitch has 20,000 views, could be the next LOL

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d9C5gUiGm8U

I was wondering where the QQ was...

I've posted this before and I'll post it again.

"Wards cost money when Lee Sin was introduced to the game. Ward hoping was designed to be a big play with big risk. The introduction of free ward items was a huge buff to Lee Sin that's never been addressed.

Make him only able to ward hop to Control Wards. Make him spend 75g every time he wants to ward hop. It still allows the "LCS BIG PLAYZ" but stops people from spamming wards and jumping everywhere."

When is riot going to address this huge sleeper buff he get years ago and actually do something about it?
Why? Wards are worth more than 75g now because you can only get a finite amount of them now. It wasn't a "sleeper buff" lol

It's literally a sleeper buff when totem trinkets were introduced and removed the cost used to gate an ability's effectiveness. I don't get how this is hard to understand. The original limitation is that it required him to pay 75g so he could point and click dash literally anywhere without a real target. That limitation no longer exists and now he can do it for free. If the limited use of control wards are too overbearing then RIOT must look into it and see what else they can change to balance it out. Because right now he has 2 free point and click dashes ANYWHERE at all points in the game if he gets a totem.

It went from being a cost to being free, period. It's a sleeper buff because it removed the cost of a mechanic and nobody addressed how it was going to affect guys like Lee. That's on RIOT to look into before they make global changes like this without looking at all their champs first.

IMO force him to buy a Sightstone or Tracker's Knife before he's allowed to Ward Hop. He'd still be gated because he either wouldn't have the extra damage provided by Skirmisher's Sabre, or would be have an inefficient gold-to-stat item stuck in his inventory.

This also would limit, but not destroy his ganks; he'd be unable to make to ward-hop plays until he gets one of those items, but he'd still be able to gapclose to a friendly champion or minion.
